attributes.action: to end diplomatic relations with Israel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to end diplomatic relations with Israel in view of the fact that they are an outlaw state not adhering to International Humanitarian Law or Criminal Law, UN Resolutions or the generally accepted values of human decency held by the community of civilised nations.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
